channel.title: Abit of the chatback in my client is missing
channel.description:
hey guys, so my chatback in my client.. rite heres a picture of it, its kinda hard to explain.. [img]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/5870/clip00170001.jpg[/img]
its not anything to do with the sprites because ive added a whole new gameframe and it still does it.. please help?

item.title: Abit of the chatback in my client is missing
item.dc:creator: @DanJoshMac DanJoshMac
item.description:
@DanJoshMac wrote:

noo u dont understand, its nothing to do with sprites (believe me i checked) its somethin to do with the client class in my client, cos I edited somethin in ther once before it started being messed up and then i compiled and the chatback came up like that…

Read full topic
item.source: Abit of the chatback in my client is missing

item.title: Abit of the chatback in my client is missing
item.dc:creator: @mager_pk mager pk
item.description:
@mager_pk wrote:

just edit it in paint use the same color and fill it in or go to the other side and high light it and then copy and then paste it where your chatback is messed up.

Read full topic
